input.sentences: the day was beautiful | the family decided to walk around town and enjoy the day .
the old plantations were fun to look at .
the old fountain in the middle of the road was fun for the kids to splash around in .
the boys thought the old trees would be fun to climb up in .
output.sentences: Many plantations of the south have a lot of history attached to them.
Apart from their historical value, they are also very beautiful in design.
With large homes and gorgeous fountains, plantations have a beauty not found anywhere else.
The tree's lining the roadways supply garden variety as well.
Next time you're in town, check out the ferry line that travels along the plantation coast.
